name: Akai Heya Satsujin Pre-Alpha 1.0
description:
Warning: This game contains triggering content and is not recommended for the faint of heart, please make sure to take this into account before playing! 

Akai Heya Satsujin (Red Room Murder) is a game that takes place in a small, rural town of
Japan. The story follows main protagonist Hotaru Erai as she attends her senior year at Kobayashi Academy. Senior year means she is eligible to run for student council president, a high and all mighty role at this school which thrives off social dominance. When Erai loses the spot for president to her mortal enemy Fukumoto Kana things quickly take a turn for the worse. Erai devises a plan for her revenge, a plan of cold ruthless murder.

Akai Heya Satsujin is a psychological thriller horror visual novel created by two people.

This project is a major passion project between creators @rainbxwburst and @g0thfarmer on instagram. We hope you enjoy our Pre-Alpha 1.0 release!  Obviously things are incomplete like lack of sounds and music but we have worked very hard for this project and we sincerely hope it will be a good experience.
